text: The Women's team pursuit competition at the 2018 UCI Track Cycling World Championships was held on 28 February and 1 March 2018.ScheduleStart list ==Results== ===Qualifying=== The eight fastest teams advanced to the first round.Qualifying results {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center" |- ! Rank !! Nation !! Time !! Behind !! The remaining six teams were ranked on time, from which the top two proceeded to the bronze medal race.First round results {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- ! Rank !! Heat !! Nation !! Time !!
